languages.text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

traits.locale_text: Each time this creature receives damage, it consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Cult Protection{/g} to give one random ally bonus turn. That ally spends it trying to avenge the protected creature. All stacks are restored at the start of the creature's turn.

Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to his random ally. During that turn, that ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Каждый раз при получении урона (бурст-атаки прокают один раз) снимает 1 стак баффа и дает интеррапт 1 случайному союзнику-культисту, чтобы тот бежал бить атаковавшего главу культа. В начале раунда восстанавливает все стаки баффа, если на поле боя остались союзники-культисты.

languages.text: При получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} Висирь тратит 1 уровень {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}нити крови{/g}, чтобы предоставить случайному союзнику дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. В этот ход союзник пытается атаковать противника, который нанес Висирю этот урон. В начале своего хода Висирь восстанавливает все уровни {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}нити крови{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

traits.locale_text: При получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} Висирь тратит 1 уровень {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}нити крови{/g}, чтобы предоставить случайному союзнику дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. В этот ход союзник пытается атаковать противника, который нанес Висирю этот урон. В начале своего хода Висирь восстанавливает все уровни {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}нити крови{/g}.

При получении {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} Висирь тратит 1 уровень {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}нити крови{/g}, чтобы предоставить случайному союзнику дополнительный {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. В этот ход союзник пытается атаковать противника, который нанес Висирю этот урон. В начале своего хода Висирь восстанавливает все уровни {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}нити крови{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el Visir sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, consume 1 acumulación de {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}hilo de la Red Sanguinolenta{/g} para otorgar un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra a un aliado aleatorio. Durante ese turno extra, el aliado intentará atacar al enemigo que haya infligido ese daño al Visir. Todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}hilo de la Red Sanguinolenta{/g} se restablecen al comienzo del turno del Visir.
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el Visir sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, consume 1 acumulación de {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}hilo de la Red Sanguinolenta{/g} para otorgar un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra a un aliado aleatorio. Durante ese turno extra, el aliado intentará atacar al enemigo que haya infligido ese daño al Visir. Todas las acumulaciones de {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}hilo de la Red Sanguinolenta{/g} se restablecen al comienzo del turno del Visir.

languages.text: このヴィジールが{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}ブラッドスパン・スレッド{/g}を1スタック消費し、ランダムな味方1体に追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を与える。追加ターン中、このランダムな味方はヴィジールにダメージを与えた敵を攻撃しようとする。ターン開始時に{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}ブラッドスパン・スレッド{/g}をすべて回復する。
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

traits.locale_text: このヴィジールが{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたび、{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}ブラッドスパン・スレッド{/g}を1スタック消費し、ランダムな味方1体に追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}を与える。追加ターン中、このランダムな味方はヴィジールにダメージを与えた敵を攻撃しようとする。ターン開始時に{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}ブラッドスパン・スレッド{/g}をすべて回復する。

languages.text: 每当宿老受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，他都会消耗1层{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}织血丝线{/g}效果，使一名随机盟友立刻获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。在额外回合期间，这位随机盟友会试图攻击对宿老造成伤害的敌人。当宿老的回合开始时，恢复所有{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}织血丝线{/g}效果层数。
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当宿老受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，他都会消耗1层{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}织血丝线{/g}效果，使一名随机盟友立刻获得一个额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。在额外回合期间，这位随机盟友会试图攻击对宿老造成伤害的敌人。当宿老的回合开始时，恢复所有{g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}织血丝线{/g}效果层数。

languages.text: Erleidet dieser Wesir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, verbraucht er 1 Stapel {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Blutgesponnener Faden{/g}, um einem zufälligen Verbündeten einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zu gewähren. Während dieses zusätzlichen Zuges greift der zufällige Verbündete den Gegner an, der dem Wesir den Schaden zugefügt hat. Er regeneriert zu Beginn seines Zuges alle Stapel {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Blutgesponnener Faden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

traits.locale_text: Erleidet dieser Wesir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, verbraucht er 1 Stapel {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Blutgesponnener Faden{/g}, um einem zufälligen Verbündeten einen zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zu gewähren. Während dieses zusätzlichen Zuges greift der zufällige Verbündete den Gegner an, der dem Wesir den Schaden zugefügt hat. Er regeneriert zu Beginn seines Zuges alle Stapel {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Blutgesponnener Faden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le vizir subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, il consomme 1 cumul de {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Fil de la Toile de Sang{/g} pour octroyer à un allié aléatoire un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} supplémentaire pendant lequel cet allié tentera d'attaquer celui qui a infligé des dégâts au vizir. Il restaure tous ses cumuls de {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}Fil de la Toile de Sang{/g} au début de son tour.
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.

languages.text: Vezir, her {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında 1 {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}kanipi sırması{/g} birikimi harcayarak rastgele bir dost birime bir ek {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} kazandırır. Dost birim bu ek tur sırasında, Vezir'e hasar vermiş olan düşmana saldırmaya kalkar. Vezir, turunun başında tüm {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}kanipi sırması{/g} birikimlerini geri kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever this Vizsier suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, he consumes 1 stack of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} to grant an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} to a random ally. During the extra turn, this random ally tries to attack the enemy which dealt that damage to the Vizsier. He restores all the stacks of {g|f:f9bf89daca884ccf9ffecadca9045927}bloodspun thread{/g} at the start of his turn.
